description:
B.B.B.`s Mama and Papa always get along well, but today, a fight has broken out between them over the TV remote! Grandpa says it`s best not to interfere, but this time, neither Mama nor Papa is giving an inch. B.B.B. decides to step in and help them make up. How can he stop this quarrel?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What`s Gonna Happen?! Husband and Wife Fight
どうなる!? 夫婦ゲンカ
